title: Full Stack Developer
details: Designed and implemented a MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) stack to develop the web application: https://elize.io
Developed a Flask API that summarises documents using Topic Classification and Extractive Summarisation.
Engaged in customer development to learn the customer needs to develop their solutions.
Followed AGILE methodology to manage and plan SPRINT cycles to develop the technology.
Technology stack: JavaScript, Python, MongoDB, Docker, NGINX, AWS and Google Cloud.
